title: What city was the most affected by the Great Depression? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Why New York City itself. The Stock Market did not recover to 1929 levels until the mid 1950’s. Construction (with the exception of the Empire State Building), ground down to a near halt. When less people have less money to spend… YOU make less money! Now you know why today is so important.
